name: De-Age
description:
A small sized puzzle game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

The Idea is that you 'Rewind' an object back to an earlier iteration of itself, sometimes breaking it down into its core elements and sometimes converting acorns back into wood segments.

I would probably like to continue this further at a later date! I realised i was bad at making puzzles so if people have ideas comment them and i may get round to adding it in in time with some extra polish too no doubt!
